Articles.Content:
First of all let me say hello to the community here and get the whole 'This game is fantastic' stuff out the way with (which by the way, it is!).

Was wondering though since the addition of lander legs im having trouble with staging them so I can lower and raise the legs without setting off a stage seperation or another rocket fireing up. Any help would be appreciated.

Finally I will say that I can only forsee great possibilities with this game. I feel the same way as I did when I played the first release of Minecraft. Looking forward to the many additions and upgrades that will come my way.

Peace and long life Dev team.

Hi there

G lowers and raises the landing legs

Welcome to the community, enjoy your stay.

-DR

As MooCube said, the g key operates landing legs. Be aware that it operates all of them across all stages, not only those in the current stage. Design your rocket accordingly.

Other than that, welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Admiral Sordid
Ah thats awesome. I am now setting the goal of landing a Kerbin on Mun and returning him home safetly before this night ends.
Good luck with your goal, and welcome.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome!

Have fun and enjoy your stay.
